attributes.title: Are We Overreacting to Blizzard's Layoffs? - Dude Soup Podcast #213
attributes.description:
Robinhood is giving listeners of Dude Soup a FREE stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help you build your portfolio. Sign up at http://dudesoup.robinhood.com
Add Honey and get the best price automatically. That’s http://joinhoney.com/dude
Go to http://mackweldon.com and get 20% off your entire first order using promo code DUDESOUP20


This week the gang discusses all the signs of the impending demise of the video game industry including:

- The Q4 2018 numbers are in, and several of the big publishers and developers did not fare well. 

- Despite a record year of revenue, Activision-Blizzard lays-off 8% of its staff from non-development teams.

- EA experienced their worst single-day stock market drop in a decade, but saw newfound growth in Apex Legends.

- Will Apex Legends overshadow Anthem?

- Is the game industry headed for a recession?

- Activision offers a Guitar Hero Live refund program.

- Norman Reedus loves Death Stranding and Hideo Kojima.

- In celebration of Valentine's Day, we test our Sex IQ's!



Want more Dude Soup? Check out the Post Show! https://goo.gl/PhuiYx



Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/elysewillems

http://twitter.com/sirlarr

https://twitter.com/adamkovic

https://twitter.com/brucegreene



Tshirts n stuff: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/funhaus
